{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = TL-SG3210 V2.2.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = JetStream 8-Port Gigabit L2 Managed Switch with 2 SFP Slots |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_TL-SG3210_V2.0 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-SG3210 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/29/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/TP-LINK_TL-SG3210_V2.0 |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8380M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 4KEc |cpu1spd = 500 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;25Q256DFIR; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BTMA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|lan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 2
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 220 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.2 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console, microUSB |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
